mapper.select: select count(*) from shop where title like concat('%',#{query},'%') or maker like concat('%',#{query},'%');

select *,date_format(regdate, '%Y-%m-%d %T') fmtdate, format(lprice,0) fmtprice from shop where title like concat('%',#{query},'%') or maker like concat('%',#{query},'%') order by pid desc limit #{start}, #{size};
select count(*) from shop where productId=#{productId}
select *, date_format(regdate, '%Y-%m-%d %T') fmtdate, format(lprice, 0) fmtprice, (select count(*) from favorite where uid=#{uid} and pid=#{pid}) ucnt from shop where pid = #{pid}
mapper.delete: delete from favorite where uid=#{uid} and pid=#{pid}
